name: eBiz ROI
tag_list: internet-marketing-services, digital-agency, seo, ppc, sem, website-reporting, website-analytics, website-optimization
overview:
eBiz ROI, Inc. is an Internet marketing services provider or digital advertising agency enabling businesses to grow sales through the Internet while maximizing their return on marketing investments.

Services offered include:

  • Website design and development
  • Website hosting and maintenance
  • Internet advertising including display
  • Search Engine Opimization (SEO)
  • Pay Per Click (PPC) advertising
  • Website reporting and anlytics installation
  • Social media marketing and training
  • Email marketing strategy development and execution (we do not sell or rent 3rd party email lists)
